title: Ein Wochenende am See
translation: On Friday evening, Lisa packs her bag. She wants to go to the lake with her family. On Saturday morning, everyone gets up early. The sky is blue and the sun is shining. The family takes blankets, bread, and fruit with them. Also, a ball and a book go into the bag. At the lake it is quiet and beautiful. The children run straight to the water and play. Lisa and her brother build a small sandcastle. The parents sit on the blanket and read. Sometimes, Lisa swims in the cool lake. After that she dries in the sun. For lunch, there are sandwiches with cheese and tomatoes. Later, everyone takes a walk around the lake. They see birds, fish, and many trees. In the afternoon, the children play tag on the meadow. Everyone laughs loudly and has a lot of fun. In the evening, the family packs everything up again. They drive home and are tired, but happy.
